references: Amending: Ord 48022. Superseding: Ord 82716, Ord 48503. Repealing: Ord 61760, Ord 83854
summary: An ordinance relating to public auctions and the licensing thereof under the License Code (Ordinance No. 48022); amending Section 28 thereof to eliminate certain residence requirements therefrom and repealing all ordinances in conflict herewith.
